Package oopds.assignment.DC.services

Class DonorService

java.lang.Object
oopds.assignment.DC.services.DonorService
@Service public class DonorService extends Object
A Service Class to be used by the Spring API to do certain operations based on the method called. This service class contains the operations that involves the Donor.
